Name: Slime Runner
About the game: You are a slime that fell into the deep caverns in an unknown realm; all while being watched by a metaphysical entity. Explore the many linear, diverse, and challenging regions in this precision-based platformer, and find your way towards FREEDOM and SAFETY . Navigate Navigate through the 6 regions and the 60+ diverse levels. Keep pushing forward while you explore this dangerous realm. Power Up Gain Permanent powerups to progress further and take on brand new challenges each step you go. Persevere Keep pushing forward every time you die. Your death is certaintly not the end, and so keep persevering towards the very end. Find your Freedom
